alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:33PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cochise County through 315 PM MST... At 231 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elfriday, or 18 miles north of Bisbee-Douglas Airport, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elfrida, Sunizona and Rucker Canyon. This includes the following highways... Route 181 between mile markers 39 and 51. Route 191 between mile markers 20 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
